subject: Curlin (Race Horse)
Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
organizations: New York State Racing and Wagering Board
lead_paragraph: Curlin, the winner of the 2007 Preakness and Breeders’ Cup Classic, is training to become the top turf horse in the world.
snippet: Curlin, the winner of the 2007 Preakness and Breeders’ Cup Classic, is training to become the top turf horse in the world.
